message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it. Looking forward to hearing your response!
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to go down to $105 for this product, considering its value to you.  Let me know if that works for you.
